description: This tasty tuna and basil pasta salad is ready in just two simple steps. A go-to for an easy weekday meal.
name: Quick Pesto Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 120 g mixed lead baby spinach & rocket

recipeInstructions.text: Add pesto, spinach, rocket and tuna and toss well to combine. Season well with salt and pepper and serve warm or cold.
Add pesto, spinach, rocket and tuna and toss well to combine. Season well with salt and pepper and serve warm or cold.
